metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15903 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In libexpat before 2.2.8, crafted XML input could fool the parser intochanging from DTD parsing to document parsing too early; a consecutive callto XML_GetCurrentLineNumber (or XML_GetCurrentColumnNumber) then resultedin a heap-based buffer over-read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15903` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.2.7-2
libexpat1 - 2.2.7-2
No subscription required

firefox - 70.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 70.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 70.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:68.2.0+build1.1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:68.2.0+build1.1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:68.2.0+build1.1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:68.2.0+build1.1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:68.2.0+build1.1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:68.2.0+build1.1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

chromium-browser - 78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu1
chromium-browser-l10n - 78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu1
chromium-chromedriver - 78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: expat package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.7-2').
xmlrpc-c package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
sitecopy package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
matanza package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '70.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:68.2.0+build1.1-0ubuntu1').
chromium-browser package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu1').
libxmltok package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
